overview:
Investment Director of InnovationsKapital. Magnus joined InnKap from McKinsey & Co., New York in 2007. His previous career includes: COO & CFO of Mactive, Inc., the US market leader in newspaper advertising software, Founder and CEO of eWork AB, the leading Nordic technology consultant broker. In addition, his early career includes positions as Investment Manager of Telia Business Innovation and Corporate Associate of Vision Capital.

Magnus is based in New York and has an overall responsibility for InnovationsKapitalâ€™s US based investments, including Syntensia and Virtutech.

Magnus holds a Masters of Law (LLM) degree and a Master of Science in Business Administration and Economics degree, both from the University of Stockholm.
